snippet: The character Henry Francis, who works for then Governor Rockefeller, calls Romney a "clown."
abstract: The character Henry Francis, who works for then Governor Rockefeller, calls Romney a "clown."

headline.main: 'Mad Men' Takes a Swipe at a Politician Named Romney
headline.print_headline: On The Screen: Some See Veiled 2012 Political Jab, Circa 1966
